text: The Biomedical Primate Research Center (BPRC) is Europe's largest primate research center. It is a scientific research institute that performs research that contributes to the identification and development of new medicines against deadly diseases. The center is located in Rijswijk, (Zuid-Holland). BPRC employs about 110 people. ==Other websites== * The official homepage of the Biomedical Primate Research Center ==References== Category:Research organizations in Europe Category:Organizations based in the Netherlands
title: Biomedical Primate Research Centre
